Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
NOAA has generated a multi-decadal reanalysis and reforecast data set to accompany the next-generation version of its ensemble prediction system, the Global Ensemble Forecast System, version 12 (GEFSv12). Accompanying the real-time forecasts are “reforecasts” of the weather, that is, retrospective forecasts spanning the period 2000-2019.
Our team is Tinydata. We are investors in filecoin and want to get deeply involved in the filecoin ecosystem.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We have downloaded the dataset and use lotus to generate car files.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
